credit_line: Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra
title: Design for Three Geometric Motifs
provenance: Fomerly in Puiforcat Orfevre archives, Jim Finguerra, John Finguerra
medium: Pen and black ink, yellow pastel, graphite on cream tracing paper
description:
At left, square design overlaid with 4 conjoined L-shapes with circles in their right angles; at center, square design overlaid with 4 conjoined lobes overlaid with 2 intersecting rectangles with 2 circular rings at each end, at right, square design overlaid with 4 pairs of conjoined triangles centered by 2 intersecting diamond shapes which are overlaid with an octagon and a circle.
According to research by  Gail Davidson 6/97 in Puiforcat archives, Paris, may be design for churchdoors.
name: Drawing
